text: The JMeter GUI should allow the simultaneous start a test plan on multiple jmeter servers.

creator: drew_gulino@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 4851
Adds the ability to run a Test Plan on multiple remote jmeter servers simultaneously

Created attachment 4979
After testing, I found the load pattern too serial.  Each machine would run the threads, then the next, etc.  Broke the initialization into seperate loop from the start loop, allowing the systems to run their threads closer to parallel.
